d:
Event CGs and Background Illustrations for the 2004 Simulation Game Neon Genesis Evangelion: Shinji Ikari Raising Project developed and published by GAINAX. Still missing Character Sprites and additional images.

Special thanks for Durik256 on GitHub, who developed the tools which allowed me to extract the images from the game's files: https://github.com/Durik256/GOS2-Tools
n: [Non-H] Neon Genesis Evangelion: Shinji Ikari Raising Project CGs
